desc: GRA is a nonprofit arts organization, with an online and retail space supporting local artists and artisans. GRA offers live concerts, community theatre performances, and educational arts classes - for both youth and adults. In addition, GRA oversees public access channel 180 within the City of Little Falls, Minnesota.

layout.text: "A Change of Seasons" by Kari Weber. Show May 4 through June 29. Reception June, 21st 4pm.
